sourcesContent: import { Dialog , Box, Typography, ListItem, Li} from "@mui/material" import { qrCodeImage } from "../../constants/data" const dialogStyle = { height: '96%', marginTop: '12%', width: '60%', maxWidth: '100%', boxShadow: 'none' } const LoginDialog = () => { return ( To use Whatsapp on your computer 1. Open Whatsapp on your phone 2. Tap Menu Settings and select WhatsApp Web 3. Point your phone to this screen to capture the code ) } export default LoginDialog
